NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Signal for the price of electricity

manages
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Relation between a VEN and a Resource
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: manages

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Load dispatch signal
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Instructions are used to set the load values that can be expressed in terms of the desired load

NamedIndividual.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Event status
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Status of an OpenADR event
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Event status

NamedIndividual.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Resource
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Entity that is enrolled in the DR Programs and is capable of delivering some sort of change to their load profile in response to receiving a DR signal from a VTN.
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Resource

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Typical value of an interval
has typical value
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Typical value of an interval
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: has typical value

market context

cancels

NamedIndividual.shacl:name: cancels

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Duration of an event
has duration
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Duration of an event
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: has duration

NamedIndividual.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Green button report
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: This is usage history that can be transmitted using the well known GREEN BUTTON standard payloads
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Green button report

NamedIndividual.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
The metadata report can contain a specification for one or more type of reports, each report having its own set of report descriptors and specifications
NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Metadata report
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Metadata report

NamedIndividual.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Report
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Report sent from a VEN to a VTN to report the energy consumption or the status of Resources connected to the VEN
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Report

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Relationship between a VE, Resource or Asset with the Group of targets associated
belongs to
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Relationship between a VE, Resource or Asset with the Group of targets associated
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: belongs to

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Link between a signal and the interval where it is active
has interval
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Link between a signal and the interval where it is active
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: has interval

NamedIndividual.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Signal
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: The actionable information contained in an event such as electricity pricing or specific levels of load shed requested that typically trigger some preprogrammed load shed behavior by the recipient of the event.
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Signal

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Indicates the sampling rate of a report
has sampling rate
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Indicates the sampling rate of a report
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: has sampling rate

NamedIndividual.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: History usage report
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: These are logs of usage data that are typically logged by VEN’s and can be queried by the VTN
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: History usage report

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Item
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Units for the data in the report

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Name fo an event
event name
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Name fo an event
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: event name

NamedIndividual.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Telemetry report
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: The term telemetry in the context of OpenADR refers to data that is reported periodically in real time
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Telemetry report

NamedIndividual.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OASIS Energy Market Information Exchange (EMIX)
NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Service Area
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: The Service Area expresses locations or geographic regions relevant to price communication
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Service Area

involves subject
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Relation between the report and its subject

NamedIndividual.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Event
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: An event is a notification from the utility to demand side resources requesting load shed starting at a specific time, over a specified duration, and may include targeting information designating specific resources that should participate in the event
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Event

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Bid load signal
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Signal that represents the amount of load that was bid by a resource into a program
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Bid load signal

has target

NamedIndividual.shacl:name: has target

NamedIndividual.shacl:name: has signal payload

is managed by

has event status

interval duration

NamedIndividual.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Asset
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: A type of Resource that represents a specific collection of physical loads. Resources can be composed of Assets, and an Asset may be Resource, but Assets cannot be further decomposed into multiple Assets or Resources.

NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Signal for the demand charge

NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Payload associated to every report

priority

accuracy
